body:
I think this list should be merged with ALLOC_WRAP, which serves a similar purpose.
ALLOC_WRAP  currently doesn't take an ${arg_name} parameter, but it can added as an option:

Example:
```
 'THTensor*': 'new ${Tensor}(context${,arguments})',
```

Then when formatting you can set `CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[])` to leave arguments blank or set it `CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[call])` when you want to add add something to the list.

Then when formatting you can set CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[]) to leave arguments blank or set it CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[call]) when you want to add add something to the list.

ALLOC_WRAP  currently doesn't take an ${arg_name} parameter, but it can added as an option:
Example:

Then when formatting you can set CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[]) to leave arguments blank or set it CodeTemplate(ALLOC_WRAP[key]).format(arguments=[call]) when you want to add add something to the list.
